tiles.name: BE API Requests and errors by Endpoint
Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## API Requests and Errors

Requests, 4XX errors and 5XX errors displayed per API and then per BE API endpoint.

The final figure shows 4XX errors on the BE API due to non-existent endpoints being called.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## API Gateway Latency by API

Average latency of each API.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## API Gateway Latency by Endpoint

Average latency of each BE API endpoint.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## BE Lambda Invocations

Invocations of each lambda from the backend-api stack.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## BE Lambda Errors

Error count of each lambda from the backend-api stack.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## BE Lambda Durations

Average duration of each lambda from the backend-api stack.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## BE Lambda Concurrency and Throttles

Max concurrencies of each non-upload lambda from the backend-api stack, alongside max throttle count.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## SQS Metrics

Aggregated metrics shown for each SQS queue in the account.

tiles.markdown:
## DynamoDB Metrics

Time taken for various operations on the different DynamoDBs in the account.
